data.comment: Today's referee, Ji Um Cho, has blown to start the match.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Daegu have a goal kick.
Suwon Bluewings push upfield but Ji Um Cho quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick in a good position for Suwon Bluewings!
In the minute 4, Can Suwon Bluewings get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Corner awarded to Suwon Bluewings.
Daegu needs to be cautious. Suwon Bluewings have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Daegu at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 10, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Suwon Bluewings.
In Suwon Daegu attack through Ryu Jae-moon. The finish is off target, however.
Ji Um Cho awards Suwon Bluewings a goal kick.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suwon.
Ji Um Cho awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Daegu.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 17, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
Ryu Jae-moon for Daegu has been booked by Ji Um Cho and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Daegu at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
Suwon Bluewings awarded a free kick in their own half.
Suwon Bluewings's Adam Taggart breaks free at Suwon World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Suwon Bluewings.
Suwon Bluewings awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Kim Dae-won (Daegu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 25, Jo Jin-woo (Daegu) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ji Um Cho awards Suwon Bluewings a goal kick.
Suwon Bluewings have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 28, Suwon Bluewings pushes forward through Lee Sang-min, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ji Um Cho signals a Suwon Bluewings throw-in in Daegu's half.
Suwon Bluewings to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In the minute 29, Ji Um Cho signals a Daegu throw-in in Suwon Bluewings's half.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Suwon Bluewings.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
In the minute 31, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Suwon Bluewings.
In the minute 33, Suwon Bluewings to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Daegu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Suwon Bluewings.
In the minute 35, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
Kim Seon-min (Daegu) has been shown a straight red card by referee Ji Um Cho.
Goal kick for Daegu at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Suwon Bluewings is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 40, Daeguâ€™s Gu Sung-yun is on his feet again at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gu Sung-yun for Daegu who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Suwon Bluewings are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Ji Um Cho will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Daegu at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Suwon Bluewings.
Ji Um Cho blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Lee Byeong-keun is making the team's first substitution at Suwon World Cup Stadium with Tsubasa Nishi replacing Cesinha.
The second half has started at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 47, Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Suwon Bluewings get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Throw-in for Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suwon.
In Suwon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suwon.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
Suwon Bluewings attack but Adam Taggart's header doesn't find the target.
Ji Um Cho awards Daegu a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Daegu to take a throw-in in Suwon Bluewings territory.
Suwon Bluewings are pushing forward but Ko Seung-beom's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Daegu at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Suwon Bluewings's half?
In the minute 56, Suwon Bluewings have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Daegu at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Suwon Bluewings.
In the minute 58, Throw-in Suwon Bluewings.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Ball safe as Suwon Bluewings is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, In Suwon Suwon Bluewings drive forward through Park Sang-hyeok. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
Suwon Bluewings awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Suwon Bluewings in the half of Daegu.
Goal kick for Daegu at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
The home team have replaced Han Seok-hee with Myeong Jun-jae. This is the first substitution made today by Lee Lim Saeng.
In the minute 65, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Suwon Bluewings.
Park Sang-hyeok of Suwon Bluewings smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Suwon Bluewings's Yeom Ki-hun misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Adam Taggart of Suwon Bluewings gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 68, Ji Um Cho awards Daegu a goal kick.
Ji Um Cho signals a Daegu throw-in in Suwon Bluewings's half.
Lee Jin-hyun is replacing Kim Dae-won for the away team.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 73, Daegu have a goal kick.
Myeong Jun-jae (Suwon Bluewings) has received a first yellow card.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
Ji Um Cho signals a Suwon Bluewings throw-in in Daegu's half.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Park Sang-hyeok with Kim Gun-hee.
Suwon Bluewings to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suwon.
Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Suwon Bluewings in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suwon.
Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) is making a second substitution, with Edgar Silva replacing Dejan Damjanovic.
In the minute 79, Yang Sang-min is replacing Ku Dae-yeong for Suwon Bluewings at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
Corner awarded to Suwon Bluewings.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Suwon Bluewings's half?
Ball safe as Suwon Bluewings is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daegu's Tsubasa Nishi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Suwon Bluewings at Suwon World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 86, Ji Um Cho awards Daegu a goal kick.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Suwon Bluewings's half?
Free kick for Suwon Bluewings in their own half.
In the minute 87, Free kick Daegu.
Goal! Edgar Silva gives Daegu a 0-1 lead in Suwon.
Shin Chang-moo with an assist there.
Throw-in high up the field for Suwon Bluewings in Suwon.
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Throw-in Daegu.
In Suwon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Daegu have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Suwon Bluewings in the half of Daegu.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
